job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>Our client is looking for a <strong>Machine Learning Engineer</strong> to help them build and automate Chatbots for their SaaS product customer support.</p><p><br></p><p>Title: Machine Learning Engineer</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Key Skills:</strong></p><p>-2+ years of NLP experience (i.e. text classification, keyphrase extraction)</p><p>-5+ years of overall engineering experience</p><p>-&nbsp;Solid Java Spring Boot knowledge for REST API integration</p><p>-CI/CD configuration</p><p></p>
